1344930.name: MagVigor
1344930.description:
Since version 1.8.8, the game on the Steam platform is no longer supported. The author of the game recommends going to his website and download the current, stable Desktop version of the game for Windows x64 for free. The site also has a separate premium store of items and resources.

Fantasy Magic third-person MO Action RPG.
Confrontations of magicians and knights on separate arenas in PvP and PvE.

Fight! ğŸº Or run!

A player can play by characters of different races and fight online battles with real people. The game concept is based on such well-known projects as SpellForce and World of Tanks. In 2018 appeared the idea of creating third-person (+ first-person) magic fights in multiplayer mode. The name Â«MagVigorÂ» comes from the words Magic and Vigor, which means Â«Magical EnergyÂ» or Â«Witchcraft PowerÂ». Locations are designed for 5-10 players. The goal is to level up your warriors as much as possible for more interesting and colorful magic fights.

The Unity + Photon (PUN) technology was chosen for implementing the client.
The server part is in a multithreaded version.
